record.msg:
Hello there! Welcome to the world of polyrhythms.
My name is Polyev and I'll be your guide!

OK. Let's get started!
Record something and I'll try to identify what you're doing

(don't forget to authorize access to the microphone
when the browser asks you to do so!!!)
Great, everything seems to be ok. Now you can start recording. Press the RECORD button when you're ready
When you're satisfied with your recording press the stop button and then the 'DONE' button. The full interface will now appear

upload.msg:
Hello there! Welcome to the world of polyrhythms.
My name is Polyev and I'll be your guide!
It seems you already have a recording. I will now try to identify what you're doing
If you want to upload or record a new audio, you can do so at any time by interacting with the UI!

common.msg: Click the OK button when you want me to start analyzing your audio
